attributes.action: Hold to account the persons who have lost the country billions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: through all the discussions and noise over the banking crisis no people have been held to account for their actions. those that have been named and shamed have walked away with millions. these people have put mister average and the country in debt for years. if a person makes a financial mistake they are hounded until blood comes from the stone. so it should be for the persons that played fast and loose with other peoples money. they are now at liberty to do so yet again. this bonus season they will be rewarded for being incompetent, greedy and their noses will be in the bonus money trough yet again
